text: So uss shaks say ziyada zalim kaun hoga jo Allah Taalaa per jhoot banadhay ya uss ki aayaton ko jhoota bataye inn logon kay naseeb ka jo kuch kitab say hai woh inn ko mill jayega yahan tak kay jab inn kay pass humaray bhejay huye farishtay inn ki jaan qabz kerney aayen gay to kahen gay woh kahan gaye jin ki tum Allah ko chor ker ibadat kertay thay woh kahen gay kay hum say sab ghaeeb hogaye aur apney kafir honey ka iqrar keren gay
